entry.title: Overthinking decisions
entry.body: I keep revisiting the same choice because I don't want to close off options.

outputs.editor:
SUMMARY:
I keep revisiting a decision because I do not want to close off options.
FIXES:
- "revisiting": specify frequency or triggers to reduce ambiguity.
- "same choice": name the decision to make the issue concrete.
- "close off options": clarify which options feel most costly to lose.
REWRITE:
I keep revisiting the same decision because I do not want to close off options.
